first_screen.heading: A learning space for Nervos developers
first_screen.sub_heading: We are committed to ensuring that new CKB developers have an easy learning curve,
first_screen.sub_heading_modifier: by providing easy-to-understand interactive courses and friendly documentation.

course.heading: Some Courses
course.sub_heading: More easy-to-understand courses are in the pipeline.

interactive.title: Interactive course
interactive.description: Each chapter in the course has a certain level of interactivity. Only after completing the interaction and understanding the knowledge of the chapter, you can proceed to the next chapter or course.

nft.title: NFT badge
nft.description: By completing certain chapters of the course you can unlock a badge reward. You will receive a commemorative NFT badge provided by CKB Academy.

keyword.title: Keyword annotation
keyword.description: Keywords with hover annotations that link to summary explanations will help you understand the concepts.

course.contribute: CKB Academy is an open-source community that welcomes developers who are passionate about the Nervos ecosystem to join and contribute high-quality courses and documentation.

ecosystem.heading: Start building a real project
ecosystem.sub_heading: Have you completed all courses? It's time to start the CKB development journey.
ecosystem.sub_heading_modifier: To that end, we have carefully selected some resources that you may use next.

contribute.heading: Contribution to CKB Academy
contribute.sub_heading: This website is open source. You can propose changes to any of the content on this site, suggest great new features, or help us fix bugs.
